com.cognifide.qa.bb.dragdrop

Class DraggableWebElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cognifide.qa.bb.dragdrop.DraggableWebElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Draggable

    public class DraggableWebElement
extends Object
implements Draggable
    This class wraps WebElement into Draggable interface.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DraggableWebElement(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement dragElement, FramePath framePath, FrameSwitcher switcher)
      Constructs DraggableWebElement.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dropByOffset(int x, int y)
      Performs the drag and drop: switches to the frame that contains source element, grabs the source element by clicking on it, slowly moves towards the drop area, release the mouse button when reaches the center of the drop area.
      void dropTo(Droppable droppable)
      Performs the drag and drop with additional click.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • DraggableWebElement

        @Inject
public DraggableWebElement(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement dragElement,
                                    FramePath framePath,
                                    FrameSwitcher switcher)
        Constructs DraggableWebElement. Initializes its fields.
        Parameters:
        dragElement - represents WebElement
        framePath - FramePath to the WebElement
        switcher - FrameSwitcher object

    • Method Detail

      • dropByOffset

        public void dropByOffset(int x,
                         int y)
        Performs the drag and drop:
        • switches to the frame that contains source element,
        • grabs the source element by clicking on it,
        • slowly moves towards the drop area,
        • release the mouse button when reaches the center of the drop area.
        Specified by:
        dropByOffset in interface Draggable
        Parameters:
        x - offset value
        y - offset value

      • dropTo

        public void dropTo(Droppable droppable)
        Performs the drag and drop with additional click.
        Specified by:
        dropTo in interface Draggable
        Parameters:
        droppable - - droppable element
